name: CreateProxyRecords
description:
Create a proxy record for an organization.

This tool calls the Datadog API to create a new proxy record within a specified organization. Use this tool when you need to add proxy records for managing organizational network proxies.

parameters.name: organization_identifier
parameters.description: A unique string identifier for the organization to which the proxy record will be added.

parameters.name: proxy_record_details
parameters.description: JSON object detailing the proxy record to create, including 'id', 'domain', 'target_cname', 'status', 'message', 'created_at', 'updated_at', and 'created_by'.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.
